propositions.text: The document is titled '傻大姐收美男'.
The document is hosted on www.27txt.com.
The document contains a preface labeled '序'.
The preface repeats the title '傻大姐收美男' multiple times.

concepts.name: 傻大姐收美男
concepts.context: Appears as the main title, in the preface, and repeatedly within the preface content.

concepts.name: 序
concepts.context: Appears as a section heading for the preface.

hierarchy.structure: The document has a main title, a source URL, and a preface section which consists of the repeated title.
